bill.title: Adds to and amends existing law to define a term; to revise provisions relating to disclosures in elections to authorize a levy; to provide that no candidate's name may appear on a ballot for more than one judicial office; to remove language that prohibits an elector from changing certain information on an application for absentee ballot; to authorize county adoption of an electronic poll book and to provide related requirements; and to provide initiative and referendum procedures for local entities.
bill.description: Adds to and amends existing law to define a term; to revise provisions relating to disclosures in elections to authorize a levy; to provide that no candidate's name may appear on a ballot for more than one judicial office; to remove language that prohibits an elector from changing certain information on an application for absentee ballot; to authorize county adoption of an electronic poll book and to provide related requirements; and to provide initiative and referendum procedures for local entities.

history.action: Introduced, read first time, referred to JRA for Printing
Reported Printed and Referred to State Affairs
